Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 24th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2007...
Traded from Philadelphia to Colorado on 6/4/2007 (Going to COL: C T. d'Arnaud, P L. Broadway. Going to PHI: C B. Henley)...
Traded from Colorado to Oakland on 7/31/2007 (Going to OAK: C T. d'Arnaud, P G. Gonzalez, P B. Norris, SS T. Dawkins. Going to COL: 2B D. Uggla, P S. Hill)...
Injured on 6/1/2008 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Oakland to Cincinnati on 2/8/2011 (Going to OAK: RF H. Pence, 3B A. Callaspo, P V. Pestano. Going to CIN: C T. d'Arnaud, SS C. Colon, CF T. Nixon)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/15/2011, off Ted Lilly (CHN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/2011, off Wade Miley (HOU)...
Injured on 6/13/2012 with a Broken Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Milwaukee on 8/5/2012...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (N) on 8/14/2012...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/2013, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against St. Louis, driving in 8 runs on 7/31/2014...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 9/27/2014...
Drove in 8 runs against St. Louis on 4/29/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/11/2015 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 6/23/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/25/2016, hitting .450 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/5/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/20/2016, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2016, hitting .381 with 8 HR, 28 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 5/2/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2017, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 5/24/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2017, hitting .458 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against St. Louis on 7/4/2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2017, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2017, hitting .383 with 10 HR, 28 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 9/28/2017...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2017, hitting .319 with 52 HR, 162 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 2017...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis on 4/7/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/8/2019, hitting .500 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/17/2019, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/22/2019, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...

Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2023, hitting .609 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 6/1/2023 with a Broken Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
